name: Oliver Swanick

topics.response_text: {exulting - you won lottery - you weren't killed}Yeah! Who won the lottery? I did!
{exulting- you won lottery so you weren't killed}{are you fucking stupid?}Are you kidding me? Never felt better!

topics.topic_text: What sort of lottery did you win?
topics.response_text: {Exulting - you weren't killed}What lottery?{emphasis on "The"}The lottery, that's what lottery! Are you stupid?
{exulting - so filled with joy you're not sure what player asked you}Powder Ganger? What? I mean, yeah, used to be, sure!

topics.topic_text: You're the guy who won the lottery.
Do you remember the message you were told to spread?

description:
Oliver Swanick is a 35 year-old Caucasian Male.

A former inmate of the NCR Correctional Facility who joined Eddie's Powder Gangers after Samuel Cooke orchestrated a mass breakout. Swanick was present in Nipton when Vulpes Inculta and the Legion forces captured the town. As the 'winner' of Vulpes' lottery, he was the only person allowed to leave Nipton alive and unharmed.

Oliver Swanick's Personality: Pragmatic and fearful, Oliver is desperately trying to survive after witnessing the Legion's brutality. He's quick to approach strangers but equally quick to flee, showing a clear survival instinct above all else.

Oliver Swanick's Backstory: Oliver Swanick was serving time in the NCR Correctional Facility when Samuel Cooke orchestrated a mass breakout in 2281. Like many other inmates, Oliver joined Eddie's newly-formed Powder Ganger faction. When the Powder Gangers were stationed in Nipton, Oliver was among those captured by Vulpes Inculta and the forces of the Caesar's Legion. During the Legion's 'lottery' to determine the fate of the town's captives, Oliver drew the first-place ticket, which ironically meant he was the only one allowed to leave Nipton unharmed while others faced execution or enslavement.
